title: The best early Prime Day 2023 laptop deals
description: Amazon Prime Day is almost here, and while we may have to wait until the main event to see more discounts on laptops, you can still get your hands on great accessories.

title: The best early Prime Day 2023 security camera deals
description: Looking to beef up your home's security camera system? Here are the best security camera deals we found ahead of Amazon Prime Day.

title: What happens if a superintelligent AI goes rogue? OpenAI doesn't want to find out
description: OpenAI is warning that a super-smart AI could 'lead to the disempowerment of humanity or even human extinction.' So it's building a team to stop it.

title: I can't recommend the 15-inch MacBook Air enough, even if it's not for me
description: Instead of pushing users upmarket, Apple created arguably the best laptop for most people at a relatively accessible price.

title: 5 things to know about Meta's Threads app before you entangle your Instagram account
description: Facebook's parent company released its Instagram companion app, Threads, as a direct competitor to Twitter.

title: ChatGPT sees its first monthly drop in traffic since launch
Twitter rival Threads sees 23 million signups overnight
description: Many have tried and many have failed, but can Mark Zuckerberg finally take down Twitter? He's off to a good start.

title: Human coding error identified as cause of digital bank service outage
description: The coding error in a software used for system maintenance had resulted in DBS Bank's hours-long service outage in May, but unrelated to another outage in March.

title: Twitter rival Bluesky launches custom domain names as first paid service
description: In an effort to remain ad-free, Bluesky is offering a paid service through which you can directly purchase your own domain name to highlight and verify your identity.

title: Forget Manfrotto: This do-it-all tripod is so good I wound up buying two
description: Geekoto is a lesser-known brand, but its tripod is flexible and solid enough to meet just about any production need.

title: iPhone overheating and burning through the battery fast? This weird fix might help
description: Frustrated by your iPhone's bad battery life and constant overheating? Tearing out your hair because you think you've tried everything? Try this!

title: These open-ear headphones ditch the bone conduction tech for something shockingly better
description: Shokz excels at bone conduction technology, but its latest OpenFit buds ditch the vibrational output in favor of better audio performance.

title: How to delete saved addresses and credit cards in Firefox for improved security and privacy
description: If you're looking to get the most out of Firefox security and privacy, you might consider not only deleting all saved addresses and credit cards but also disabling the autofill option.
